because of leading zeros for p-key of DEBH and added same program as used
in ODH001 to write history
Part 3: Delete input row
-- set t203_handled = Y, perform part 3: Delete input row and continue with the next T203 row
If T203_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3 (Legal owner)
If T203_DEBH_NO = 0:Perform BDH401A (create legal owner)
ElsePerform BDH401B (update existing legal owner)
If T203_CODECREDITLIMIT = 2 (Affiliate) there are 3 possibilities:
Check Locationnumber
If v.LOCATIONNUMBER not is blank then check if v.LOCATIONNUMBER is a figure of 12 numeric digits
If this is not the case then report the error in MQ293 and continue with Part 3: Delete input row
-- continue with Part 3: Delete input row

ExpSyntax.val: 'Different or unkown Chamber of Commerce numbers'
'Different or unkown Chamber of Commerce numbers'

Text.val: ... store MQ293
Continue only if T203_DEBH_NO exist in the system (AK SCR11965 )
If DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 1
If T203_CODECREDITLIMIT = 2 (affiliate) and DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 2 test for
every client if the legal owner already exists
Obtain a DHIC row with DHIC_INFS_CODE = IS and DHIC_DEBH = DEBH_NO
Obtain a DHIC row with DHIC_INFS_CODE = KV and DHIC_DEBH = DEBH_NO
Update DEBC_NONAME_CHECK

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH.DEBH_NO from :1/DHIC DHIC, :1/DEBH DEBH where DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBH.DEBH_NO and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'KV' and DHIC.DHIC_ID = ':2' and DEBH.DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b, :1/DEBH DEBH where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO and b.DEBC_DATDELETED is null)) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO and b.DEBC_DATDELETED is null)) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- Write history

-- Write history
-- Write history
-- Update on DEBH only allowed if there exists no credit limit for related
debtor clients
-- Update debtor search table
Only update PADR fields if <> HADR fields
If DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 1

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,7}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,11}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Report probable affilite which must be connected to the new owner
-- If this row already exists where DHIC_DEBH <> T203_DEBH_NO and v.LOCATIONNUMBER <> zero

ExpSyntax.val: 'Location ID already exists for another debtor: '&Trim(Str({0,3},'9'))

Text.val: -- Write history
-- If this row already exists where DHIC_DEBH <> T203_DEBH_NO and v.ID_INFOSUPPLIER <> blank or zero

ExpSyntax.val: 'ID Information Supplier already exists for another debtor: '&Trim(Str({0,3},'9'))

Text.val: -- Write history
-- Write history
-- Write history
-- Write history

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH.DEBH_NO from :1/DHIC DHIC, :1/DEBH DEBH where DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBH.DEBH_NO and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'KV' and DHIC.DHIC_ID = ':2' and DEBH.DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b, :1/DEBH DEBH where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO and b.DEBC_DATDELETED is null)) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH in (:2, :3)

select CLNT203_OFFICE from :1/CLNT where exists (select * from :1/DEBC where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DEBH = :2 and DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null) group by CLNT203_OFFICE
